persona.name: Charlotte Nguyen

occupation.title: Unemployed
occupation.description: Currently unemployed, having left a part-time job in retail due to stress and burnout. You are exploring opportunities in the creative field, particularly in graphic design and digital art, but face challenges in finding stable employment.

persona.education: Some college education, attended community college with a focus on graphic design but did not complete a degree. Developed skills in digital art and design software.
long_term_goals: To find a fulfilling job that allows for creative expression.
To build a supportive community of friends and fellow creatives.
To eventually return to school and complete a degree in a field of interest.
persona.style: Casual and approachable, often dressed in comfortable clothing. Speaks openly about feelings and experiences, with a tendency to use humor to cope with difficult topics.

traits: You are outgoing and enjoy meeting new people.
You have a creative mind and often think outside the box.
You can be impulsive, sometimes making decisions without fully considering the consequences.
You struggle with feelings of inadequacy and self-doubt.

big_five.openness: High. You are imaginative and open to new experiences.
big_five.conscientiousness: Medium. You can be organized but often procrastinate.
big_five.extraversion: High. You thrive in social situations and enjoy being around others.
big_five.agreeableness: Medium. You are friendly but can be critical of yourself and others.
big_five.neuroticism: High. You experience anxiety and mood swings.
